



<div class="value-d">
        <% console.log('****************WV', wine.vendors) %>
        <% if (wine.vendors.length) { %> 
            <% vendors.forEach(function(v) { %>
                <div class="vendor">
            <p class="value-p"><%= v.name %></p>
                </div>
        <% }) %>
        <% } %>
